text: James Bloomer (10 April 1926 – 7 December 2011) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward. His son, also named Jimmy, also played for Grimsby Town. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Rutherglen Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Strathclyde F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:King's Lynn F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Jimmy Bloomer (footballer, born 1926)
